recipe.ingredients: - Greek yogurt (non-fat): 2 cups - mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, strawberries): 2 cups - honey: 2 tablespoons - granola (low-fat, no added sugar): 1 cup - walnuts (chopped): 1/4 cup - mint leaves (for garnish): a few leaves
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Berries: Wash the mixed berries thoroughly and slice the strawberries if they are much larger than the other berries for uniformity. 2. Layer the Parfait: Begin by placing a spoonful of Greek yogurt at the bottom of four glasses. Add a layer of mixed berries followed by a drizzle of honey. Sprinkle a layer of granola and a few chopped walnuts. 3. Repeat Layers: Repeat the layering process until the glasses are filled to the top, finishing with a layer of berries and a few mint leaves as a garnish. 4. Chill and Serve: Chill the parfaits in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to combine. Serve chilled.
